publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4824 Mr Duncan McNeil: West Kilbride Craft and Design Town—That the Parliament congratulates the West Kilbride Community Initiative and the townspeople of West Kilbride on their receipt of the Department of Trade and Industry’s national accolade of the UK’s official capital of enterprise; recognises the tremendous achievement of the town in winning this award in competition with some of the nation’s most ambitious and most expensive entrepreneurial projects; believes that the example of West Kilbride can be used to regenerate other town centres in the west of Scotland and beyond; notes the contribution of Scottish Enterprise Ayrshire to community renewal and enterprise in West Kilbride, and calls on the Enterprise Network to support the next phase of development in West Kilbride and further roll out the lessons of West Kilbride more widely in west of Scotland communities.

S2M-4824 Mr Duncan McNeil: West Kilbride Craft and Design Town—That the Parliament congratulates the West Kilbride Community Initiative and the townspeople of West Kilbride on their receipt of the Department of Trade and Industry’s national accolade of the UK’s official capital of enterprise; recognises the tremendous achievement of the town in winning this award in competition with some of the nation’s most ambitious and most expensive entrepreneurial projects; believes that the example of West Kilbride can be used to regenerate other town centres in the west of Scotland and beyond; notes the contribution of Scottish Enterprise Ayrshire to community renewal and enterprise in West Kilbride, and calls on the Enterprise Network to support the next phase of development in West Kilbride and further roll out the lessons of West Kilbride more widely in west of Scotland communities.
S2M-4824 West Kilbride Craft and Design Town (lodged on 20 September 2006) Scott Barrie*
S2M-4824 West Kilbride Craft and Design Town (lodged on 20 September 2006) Murray Tosh*
S2M-4824 West Kilbride Craft and Design Town (lodged on 20 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4824 West Kilbride Craft and Design Town (lodged on 20 September 2006) Irene Oldfather*
